naslov: Etažirana poslovno-stambena zgrada,Tribunj, 397.00 m2, top lokacija! (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju izvrsna katnica, 397,46 m2, Tribunj.   Kuća je u nizu sa 5 stambeno-poslovnih jedinica.   Sastoji se od poslovnih prostora u prizemlju i stambenih prostora na dvije etaže, 1. katu i potkrovlju. SKLADIŠTE: 14,82 m2 – trijem + poslovni prostor + WC POSLOVNI PROSTOR: 49,85 m2 – poslovni prostor + ženski WC + muški WC KONOBA: 57,70 m2 - konoba + spremište + WC STAN S1: 97,11 m2   - 1. kat: hodnik + terasa + predprostor + ulaz + dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom + spavaća soba 1 + kupaonica + kuhinja   - Potkrovlje: degažman + spavaća soba 2 + spavaća soba 3 - Prizemlje: spremište 30,34 m2 – predprostor + spremište 1 + spremište 2 + WC STAN S2: 147,64 m2   - 1. kat: stepenišni krak + ulaz + degažman + spavaća soba 1 + spavaća soba 2 + kuhinja sa blagovaonicom + stepenište + kupaonica + terasa sa podestom - Potkrovlje: stepenište s degažmanom + spavaća soba 3 + spavaća soba 4 + hodnik + kupaonica + dnevni boravak + terasa Okućnice nema, ali uz objekt dolaze četiri vanjska, nenatkrivena parkirna mjesta.   Najstariji dio kuće je iz 1920. godine, a nadogradnje su iz 1983. i 1987. godine. Danas je kuća potpuno obnovljena i adaptirana.   Vanjska stolarija je PVC s dvostrukim staklom i komarnicima. Podovi su u kvalitetnoj keramici i parketu.   Grijanje je na struju, kombinacija centralnog i inverter klima uređaja kojima se prostor i hladi.   Kuća ima satelitski program i bežični Internet.   Orijentirana je na jug i ima prekrasan pogled na more i Tribunjsku marinu. Svega je 100 metara od mora!   Novi vlasnik se može baviti iznajmljivanjem/zakupom apartmana i poslovnih prostora. Jedan od apartmana se trenutno iznajmljuje. Na booking.com postiže izvanrednu ocjenu od 9,4 od 10 bodova!   Prostori su moderno namješteni i opremljeni u potpunosti. Prodaja inventara je moguća po dogovoru. Objekt je na izuzetno atraktivnoj poziciji. Začas ste u samom centru Tribunja, a u blizini je i nekoliko plaža. Najbliže su udaljene svega 300 i 700 metara. Tribunj ljeti ima bogatu turističku ponudu, a zimi sve što je potrebno za udoban život u malom dalmatinskom mjestu.   Do obližnjeg Šibenika je 10 km. Cca 50 km je do zračnih luka u Splitu i Zadru.   Izvrsna investicija za sve iznajmljivače i poduzetnike!   Prostori se mogu kupiti i zasebno budući da je zgrada etažirana. U tom slučaju cijena za svaki će se posebno dogovoriti sa vlasnikom.   Ne propustite! Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon 098 / 915 - 5643 ( Ivan ) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01 / 3866 - 844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 090 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com For   sale   excellent   storey   house  ,   397  .  46   m2  ,   Tribunj  . The   house   is   in   a   row   with   5   residential  -  commercial   units  . It   consists   of   business   premises   on   the   ground   floor   and   living   spaces   on   two   floors  , 1st   floor   and   attic  . WAREHOUSE  :   14  .  82   m2   –   porch   +   office   space   +   toilet OFFICE   SPACE  :   49  .  85   m2   –   office   space   +   women  '  s   toilet   +   men  '  s   toilet TAVERN  :   57  ,  70   m2   -   tavern   +   storage   room   +   toilet APARTMENT   S1  :   97  .  11   m2   -   1st   floor  :   hallway   +   terrace   +   entrance   hall   +   living   room   with   dining   room   +   bedroom   1   +   bathroom   +   kitchen -   Attic  :   degasman   +   bedroom   2   +   bedroom   3 -   Ground   floor  :   storage   room   30  .  34   m2   –   anteroom   +   storage   room   1   +   storage   room   2   +   toilet APARTMENT   S2  :   147  .  64   m2   -   1st   floor  :   staircase   arm   +   entrance   +   degasman   +   bedroom   1   +   bedroom   2   +   kitchen   with   dining   room   +   staircase   +   bathroom   +   terrace   with   landing -   Attic  :   staircase   with   degasman   +   bedroom   3   +   bedroom   4   +   hallway   +   bathroom   +   living   room   +   terrace There   is   no   garden  ,   but   the   building   comes   with   four   outdoor  ,   uncovered   parking   spaces  . The   oldest   part   of   the   house   is   from   1920  ,   and   the   upgrades   are   from   1983   and   1987  . Today  ,   the   house   has   been   completely   renovated   and   renovated  . The   exterior   joinery   is   PVC   with   double   glazing   and   mosquito   nets  . The   floors   are   in   quality   ceramics   and   parquet  . Heating   is   electric  ,   a   combination   of   central   and   inverter   air   conditioning   that   cools   the   space  . The   house   has   a   satellite   program   and   wireless   Internet  .   It   is   oriented   to   the   south   and   has   a   beautiful   view   of   the   sea   and   the   Tribunj   marina  . It   is   only   100   meters   from   the   sea  ! The   new   owner   can   deal   with   renting  /  leasing   apartments   and   business   premises  . One   of   the   apartments   is   currently   rented  . On   the   booking.com  ,   he   achieves   an   outstanding   score   of   9  .  4   out   of   10   points  !   The   premises   are   modernly   furnished   and   fully   equipped  . Inventory   can   be   sold   by   appointment  .   The   property   is   in   an   extremely   attractive   position  .   In   no   time   you   are   in   the   center   of   Tribunj  ,   and   there   are   several   beaches   nearby  . The   nearest   ones   are   only   300   and   700   meters   away  . Tribunj   has   a   rich   tourist   offer   in   the   summer  ,   and   everything   you   need   for   a   comfortable   life   in   a   small   Dalmatian   town   in the   winter  . Nearby   Šibenik   is   10   km   away  .   It   is   about   50   km   to   the   airports   in   Split   and   Zadar  .   An   excellent   investment   for   all   renters   and   entrepreneurs  !   The   premises   can   also   be   purchased   separately   since   the   building   is   condominium  .   In   this   case  ,   the   price   for   each   will   be   agreed   separately   with   the   owner  .   Don  '  t   miss   it  !
